canCreateCommercial: If you have a business, you can create a commercial, for free in order to be contacted from students of the school for your services.
graciasPorUsarLaApp: Thank you for using the app to help us balance the classes!
noAusencias: It seems you don't have any more classes at the moment
noCommercials: You don't have any Commercial at the moment.
noCursos: You are not registered in any course at the moment
noCursosProfe: You don't have any course assigned yet.
noNecesitamosTaxis: It seems that today we have all the classes balanced and we don't need Taxis!
noNews: We have no news for you...
noVideos: There are no Videos at the moment...
sigueMirandoTaxis: Anyway, keep looking today or other days, in case there are changes.
